wordpressWpDailyReads.title: July 4, Independence and your 401K
wordpressWpDailyReads.content: Happy 4th of July, the American workforce is more independent than ever.  People are changing jobs at an alarming rate. There are actually more job openings than there are job participants. If you are thinking about switching jobs, or you’ve switched jobs in your career, don’t leave your 401k behind.  Watch the video below for some quick tips on making sure your 401K goes where you go.
